name: S-Punk (Demo)
description:
S-Punk is a 3rd person, top-down steampunk Boss Rush Game. The player, who takes on the role of an Artificer, must use their respective unique abilities to defeat one Boss and their minions in 3 different environments, earning “scrap” to keep themselves alive and continue progressing.

Feedback Survey - Please complete this survey to provide information on your experience playing our game.

Bug Report - Please report any bugs you find here using this form.
